overview: Filmed and recorded live at the iconic Red Rocks Amphitheater, Live on Red Rocks captures O.A.R. in their element - performing an inspired and energetic show to a packed house in the middle of summer. The performance, delivered in High Definition, contains 22 songs including hits "Shattered (Turn the Car Around)," "Love and Memories," and "Heaven" as well as fan favorites "Black Rock" and "That Was A Crazy Game of Poker
title: O.A.R. Live At Red Rocks
